settings.text: We are a steel fabricating shop focused on design and fabrication of products pertaining to vehicle modification. We do custom work as well as production orders. We offer CNC cutting, sandblasting, and powder coating services as well.

settings.title: F-450 Super Duty
settings.text: The dealership said a custom bumper would not work with this truck because the skirt at the bottom of the stock bumper is necessary for transmission cooling. We designed this bumper custom and added a lip at the bottom edge so that a rubber skirt could be added keeping the trans at safe temps. (See gallery for more pics)

settings.title: Land Rover, Range rover
settings.text: We designed and built this rear bumper with a swing out tire carrier for this Range rover. The bumper is made to accommodate parking sensors as well blind spot monitors hidden behind the plastic window you see on the side of the bumper. It was a very difficult and custom project which is why you will have a hard time finding another custom rear bumper for this vehicle!

settings.title: Ram 2500
settings.text: On this project, we worked with the customer to incorporate some requested symbol cutouts and custom integrated lighting options as well as a very stout sch. 40 pipe ram bar, to give this bumper a unique and custom feel. (See gallery for more pics)
